text: The 1893 New York Giants season was the franchise's 11th season. The team finished in fifth place in the National League with a 68-64 record, 19.5 games behind the Boston Beaneaters. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * July 1893: Les German was purchased by the Giants from the Augusta Electricians.Les German at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
